web_snippets: Bio. Lauren Onkey is the director of the Corcoran School of the Arts and Design and Professor of Music at the George Washington University.

February 20, 2020 • For our series One-Hit Wonders/Second-Best Songs, NPR Music Senior Director Lauren Onkey recommends "Out of Left Field" by Percy Sledge.
